description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record.  The SVC_LN_INFO table holds information about the service lines on the claim.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: LN_FROM_DT
columns.description: This item holds the earliest service date represented on the line.

columns.name: LN_TO_DT
columns.description: This item holds the latest service date represented on the line. It will not be populated if the line only represents a single date.

columns.name: LN_PROC_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a code identifying the type of procedure code reported on the line.

columns.name: LN_PROC_CD
columns.description: This item holds the procedure code for the line.

columns.name: LN_PROC_DESC
columns.description: This item holds a procedure specific description for the line.

columns.name: LN_PROC_MOD
columns.description: This item holds a comma delimited list of modifiers for the procedure on the line.

columns.name: LN_QTY_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a code identifying the unit in which the quantity is reported.

columns.name: LN_QTY
columns.description: This item holds the quantity for the service line.

columns.name: LN_AMT
columns.description: This item holds the billed amount for the line.  For Uniform Billing (UB) claims, this amount will include both covered and non-covered amounts.

columns.name: LN_REV_CD
columns.description: This item holds the revenue code for the service line.

columns.name: LN_REV_CD_DESC
columns.description: This item holds a revenue code specific description for the line.

columns.name: LN_RATE
columns.description: This item holds the daily rate for accommodation revenue code lines.

columns.name: LN_NON_CVD_AMT
columns.description: This item holds the non-covered amount for the line.

columns.name: LN_POS_CD
columns.description: This item holds the place of service code identifying where the service on the line was performed.

columns.name: LN_DX_PTR
columns.description: This item holds a comma delimited list of diagnosis pointers. Each piece of the string is a line number from the claim diagnosis table.

columns.name: LN_EMERG_IND
columns.description: This item identifies the service on the line as an emergency service.

columns.name: LN_EPSDT_IND
columns.description: This item identifies the service on the line as an Early & Periodic Screening, Diagnosis, and Treatment (EPSDT) service.

columns.name: LN_FAM_PLAN_IND
columns.description: This item identifies the service on the line as a family planning service.

columns.name: LN_COPAY_STAT_CD
columns.description: This item identifies when the patient was exempt from a copay for the service on the line.

columns.name: LN_AMB_PAT_CNT
columns.description: This item holds the number of patients transported in the ambulance when the line represents an ambulance service.

columns.name: LN_MAMM_CERT_NUM
columns.description: This item holds the mammography certification number for the line.

columns.name: LN_CLIA_NUM
columns.description: This item holds the Clinical Laboratory Improvement Amendment (CLIA) number for the line.

columns.name: LN_ORAL_CAV_CD
columns.description: This item holds a comma delimited list of oral cavity codes for the line.

columns.name: LN_DENT_PROSTHESIS
columns.description: This item holds a code to indicate the initial placement or replacement of a dental prosthesis, crown, or inlay.

columns.name: LN_DME_CMN_CD
columns.description: This item holds a code describing how the certificate of medical necessity (CMN) for the line was transmitted to the DMERC.

columns.name: LN_DME_CERT_TYP
columns.description: This item identifies the type of certification (initial, renewal, or revised) applies to the line.

columns.name: LN_DME_DURATION
columns.description: This item holds the number of months the durable medical equipment (DME) supplies will be needed.

columns.name: LN_DME_RECERT_DT
columns.description: This item holds the new durable medical equipment (DME) certification date when the certification type is renewed or revised.

columns.name: LN_CME_BEG_THRPY_DT
columns.description: This item holds the date that therapy requiring the durable medical equipment (DME) began.

columns.name: LN_DME_COND_IND
columns.description: This item holds a comma delimited list of durable medical equipment (DME) condition codes for the service line.

columns.name: LN_CNTRCT_TYP
columns.description: This item holds a code representing the type of contract between the provider and the payer used for the service line.

columns.name: LN_CNTRCT_AMT
columns.description: This item holds the contract amount for the line.

columns.name: LN_CNTRCT_PCT
columns.description: This item holds the contract percentage for the line.

columns.name: LN_CNTRCT_CD
columns.description: This item holds a code representing the line.

columns.name: LN_CNTRCT_DISCNT_P
columns.description: This item holds the discount percentage for the line.

columns.name: LN_CNTRCT_VERS_ID
columns.description: This item identifies the version of the contract used for the line.

columns.name: LN_NDC
columns.description: This item holds the National Drug Code (NDC) for the service line.

columns.name: LN_NDC_UNIT_QTY
columns.description: This item holds the quantity associated with the National Drug Code (NDC), in terms of the units reported with the NDC.

columns.name: LN_NDC_UNIT
columns.description: This item holds the units associated with the National Drug Code (NDC).

columns.name: LN_RX_NUM_QUAL
columns.description: This item holds a code distinguishing prescription numbers from sequence numbers used to represent compound drugs.

columns.name: LN_RX_NUM
columns.description: This item holds the prescription number for the line.

columns.name: LN_NOTE
columns.description: This item holds a line level note.

columns.name: LN_REND_PROV_TYP
columns.description: This item indicates whether the rendering provider on the line is a person or a non-person.

columns.name: LN_REND_NAM_LAST
columns.description: This item holds the rendering provider's last name (if a person) or the organization name (if a non-person).

columns.name: LN_REND_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: This item holds the rendering provider's first name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: LN_REND_NAM_MID
columns.description: This item holds the rendering provider's middle name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: LN_REND_NAM_SUF
columns.description: This item holds the suffix to the rendering provider's name (Jr, III, etc). It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: LN_REND_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the rendering provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: LN_REND_TAXONOMY
columns.description: This item holds the rendering provider's taxonomy code.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_NAM
columns.description: This item holds the name of the external location where the services were performed.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the National Provider Identifier (NPI) of the external location where the services were performed.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_ADDR_1
columns.description: This item holds the first line of the external location street address.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_ADDR_2
columns.description: This item holds the second line of the external location street address.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_CITY
columns.description: This item holds the external location's city.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_STATE
columns.description: This item holds the external location's state.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_ZIP
columns.description: This item holds the external location's ZIP code.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_CNTRY
columns.description: This item holds the external location's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: LN_SVC_FAC_CNTRY_SU
columns.description: This item holds the external location's country subdivision (state, province, etc). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: LN_SUP_NAM_LAST
columns.description: This item holds the supervising provider's last name.

columns.name: LN_SUP_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: This item holds the supervising provider's first name.

columns.name: LN_SUP_NAM_MID
columns.description: This item holds the supervising provider's middle name.

columns.name: LN_SUP_NAM_SUF
columns.description: This item holds the suffix to the supervising provider's name (Jr, III, etc).

columns.name: LN_SUP_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the supervising provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: LN_ORD_NAM_LAST
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's last name.

columns.name: LN_ORD_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's first name.

columns.name: LN_ORD_NAM_MID
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's middle name.

columns.name: LN_ORD_NAM_SUF
columns.description: This item holds the suffix to the ordering provider's name (Jr, III, etc).

columns.name: LN_ORD_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: LN_ORD_ADDR_1
columns.description: This item holds the first line of the ordering provider's street address.

columns.name: LN_ORD_ADDR_2
columns.description: This item holds the second line of the ordering provider's street address.

columns.name: LN_ORD_CITY
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's city.

columns.name: LN_ORD_STATE
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's state.

columns.name: LN_ORD_ZIP
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's ZIP code.

columns.name: LN_ORD_CNTRY
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: LN_ORD_CNTRY_SUB
columns.description: This item holds the ordering provider's country subdivision (state, province, etc). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: LN_PURCH_PROV_TYP
columns.description: This item indicates whether the purchased service provider on the line is a person or a non-person.

columns.name: LN_PURCH_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the purchased service provider's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: LN_ASST_TYP
columns.description: This item indicates whether the assistant dental surgeon on the line is a person or a non-person.

columns.name: LN_ASST_NAM_LAST
columns.description: This item holds the assistant dental surgeon's last name (if a person) or the organization name (if a non-person).

columns.name: LN_ASST_NAM_FIRST
columns.description: This item holds the assistant dental surgeon's first name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: LN_ASST_NAM_MID
columns.description: This item holds the assistant dental surgeon's middle name. It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: LN_ASST_NAM_SUF
columns.description: This item holds the suffix to the assistant dental surgeon's name (Jr, III, etc). It is only populated when the provider is a person.

columns.name: LN_ASST_NPI
columns.description: This item holds the assistant dental surgeon's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: LN_ASST_TAXONOMY
columns.description: This item holds the assistant dental surgeon's taxonomy code.

columns.name: LN_DOC_TYP
columns.description: This item holds a code indicating the type of supporting document included with the service line.

columns.name: LN_DOC_FORM_ID
columns.description: This item identifies the specific document. For example, this can identify the version number of a questionnaire so that the payer can correctly interpret the responses.
